"Don't be coy." Teasing, Roxanne said. "We've been friends for years, I know that look you get when something intrigues you."

You blushed even further. "Well... maybe we can try it just once." Timidly, you said. "Only no one can know about it."

"Great!" Clearly excited, Roxanne said. "We have spring break coming up this weekend, a whole week of nothing to do."

"Your place or mine?" With a slight grin, I asked.

Roxanne giggled. "My place and don't eat or drink too much before you come." Cheerfully, she said. "You may be stuck there for a while."

With that, she ended the call and I sighed. "What did I just get myself into?"

The days passed quickly and you met up with Roxanne at her house to find the house completely dark. "Roxanne?" Nervous, you called out. "This isn't funny..."

Suddenly, the door behind you closed and some one forced a foul smelling cloth over your nose and mouth. Before you knew it, you were plunged into darkness. What seemed like hours later, you woke up to find yourself...
124211.title: You were curious about Roxanne's toys.

1242112.content:
What seemed like hours later, you woke up to find yourself tied to a chair in the kitchen of Roxanne's house. As you became more aware of your surroundings, you found a full length mirror in front of you on a stand that revealed you were sitting in a highchair made for your size! You tried to move your arms but found you could not move them an inch. You turned to the mirror and gulped seeing that they had been tied to your sides with thin but heavy rope. On top of that, the feeding tray was firmly in its place, pinning your arms even more.

"Oh crap!" Frightened, you thought.

Your torso was tied to the back of the chair with another coil of strong ropes and your legs were held in place by ankle cuffs whose D rings were held firm to eye hooks on the legs of the highchair with padlocks. A strange neck stabilizer was secured around your neck with a padlock that forced your head back slightly and in your mouth was a ring gag that only allowed inaudible mumbles to escape your throat.

"Ah, you are awake." Giggling, came Roxanne's voice.

You tried to turn your head but the neck stabilizer prevented it. Roxanne stepped into your line of sight and gave you a shark like grin that made you shudder. She took the mirror away then returned minutes later wearing her cooking apron. "Are you ready to sample some of my latest experimental recipes?" Teasing, she asked. "I am going to enjoy feeding you all day long."

Your eyes went wide as Roxanne brought forth a rolling serving tray filled with a huge assortments of brews and potions she seemed to have prepared in advance just for this day! Seeing your expression, Roxanne giggled then...
1242112.title: A feast of bondage.

choices: You blink twice, you want to be released.
12421122.content:
Seeing your expression, Roxanne giggled then began to stroke your hair in a loving fashion. "I'm just kidding." Cooing you, she said. "I'm not going to force you through anything neither you or I know you have any real taste for."

You sighed in relief then glanced at her large tray of brews before looking at her. Roxane followed your gaze and grinned. "Oh, don't worry, you are still going to get a few samples of my cooking." Playfully, she said. "I didn't go through all of this work just to release you without playing with you just a little bit."

With that said, she looked over her variety of prepared concoctions before selecting what looked like an eight ounce vile of a dark brown liquid that had a light white foam at the top. She smiled wickedly before slowly pouring it down your throat. It didn't taste too bad but it was very rich. It was like dark chocolate with a hint of fine cream. Still, you had no choice but to swallow it down or choke. Once it was all down, your stomach almost immediately felt incredibly heavy but you did not feel full. In fact, you felt more hungry than ever.

"Did you like that?" Grinning, Roxanne said. "That was my chocolate cake in a cup. Every sip is equal to a slice of cake." She giggled. "Congratulations, you just ate a whole cake by yourself!"

Your eyes went wide and you tried to shake your head but the neck stabilizer prevented it. Only Roxanne again began to stroke your hair. "Calm down, sweetie." In a loving tone, she said. "Normally, drinking this all down would make a person too full to even stand, making them wish they hadn't sampled the entire brew. Only I custom made these brews so you would only feel full without actually being full." She smiled kindly. "I'm not that mean."

Again, you sighed in relief but went wide eyed as another eight ounce brew was poured down your throat before you could protest. Again, you were forced to drink or choke but the taste was quite good. It reminded you of gazed doughnuts. No sooner it all hit your stomach, you felt heavier still. Again, as before, you did not feel full. It was quite a strange and disturbing sensation. You could swear you had just gained twenty pounds from two drinks but you were still hungry and felt the desire to ask for more.

"That brew I call 'Baker's dozen'." Grinning, Roxanne said. "Every sip is like a single doughnut and you just ate thirteen of them."

You were not certain how much more you could take after just two drinks of these brews, even though they weren't really filling your stomach to the point of exploding. You looked at Roxanne, your eyes pleading. You were hoping that she would get the hint that you had enough. Fortunately, Roxanne did get your message and sighed. "I'll make a deal with you, Cal." Patiently, she said. "I'm going to have my fun with you until that alarm clock goes off behind me, about an hour or so from now. If you agree, blink once and I will let you tussle and tie me up to get even at a time of your choosing. if you refuse, just blink twice and I'll let you out of this now with no hard feelings."

You hesitated. Your friend's offer was tempting. On the other side of the coin, you did not know if you could take much more of these filling brews before you were forced to cry 'uncle', if the ring gag would let you pronounce the word.
12421122.title: said she was only kidding.

124211224.content:
Just as you were about to reluctantly agree to Roxanne's proposal, Katelyn entered the kitchen and saw you tied to the highchair with your mouth forced open. She turned to the tray of over a dozen brews and saw red. "What are you doing to her?!" Highly annoyed, she demanded. "First your own little brother and now your best friend?!"

"I explained what happened to Shea!" Defensively, Roxanne snapped back. "He did that to himself and all the leotard did was tickle his sides to the point of hurting because he had it on too long!" She stroked your hair gently. "As for Cat, she agreed to this. I would never do anything to deliberately hurt anyone."

"A tickle fetish is still a fetish; you're reckless!" Unimpressed, Katelyn barked. Her face softened as she turned to you. "It's okay, sweetie, Katelyn is here now."

Without another word, she demanded the key to your bonds which Roxanne sighed and reluctantly gave her. Within minutes, you were released. The two brews made you feel heavy, though you were not full, and you found yourself limping heavily. You fought the urge to moan but a few uncomfortable grunts escaped and Katelyn placed one of your arms over her neck and embraced your side to support you. "I have you, Catherine." Motherly, she said. "Don't you worry about a thing."

"Roxanne didn't mean any harm." Defending your friend, you said. "I did agree to this, she was just toying with me a little."

"I know, dear." Still plying the mother, Katelyn said. "Still, you can barely walk. There are limits to everything."

Katelyn then takes you...
124211224.title: Leader of the pack.

choices: Yuki greets you with a hug
13.content:
You were sipping a soda, when the phone rang. The surprise caused you to choke, and subsequently spill soda all over yourself. You curse under your breath, then reach for the phone, as you try to dry yourself off with some kleenex. Then, as you reach the phone, you get a static shock. "Argh!" You curse. You don't even have to look at the call ID to know who it is. Only one person could be behind all this.
"Yuki...." You growl.
"Cat, is that any way to greet a friend?" You hear her say. You can picture her mischievous grin over the phone perfectly.
"Yuki, I am wet and sticky, and I don't know how, but I know it's your fault." You say.
"Mmm, really? I knew you liked me, but I didn't think you liked me that much." She says with a sultry tone of voice. You gasp, realizing what you just said. You're not sure if Yuki is a lesbian, but you do know that she is rather... Liberal with her affection.
"I, buh, er, nuh..." You stammer, blushing.
She laughs, "I'm joking Cat. Listen, why don't you change shirts and come on over?"
You think for a moment, this could be a set up for another prank, but even that would probably be better than sitting around watching TV all night. "Alright," You resign, "I'll be over just as soon as I get cleaned up."
"Great," She beams, "See you in a few."

You wipe yourself off, and change shirts, and in a few minutes later, you're knocking on Yuriro's door. The door opens, and...
13.title: Foxy Asian

choices: She hands you a lucky cat figurine
She hands you a necklace with a curled up fox on it
131.content:
You barely have time to scream, as suddenly the floor goes out from under you. With a thud and an oof, you find yourself on a mattress in Yukiro's basement, with Yukiro looking at you, smiling. You sit up, rubbing your backside, and shoot her an angry look, "You have a trap door in your front porch? YOU HAVE A TRAP DOOR IN YOUR FRONT PORCH?!"
She gives you a catlike smile, "You like it? I got the idea from a cartoon."
"Wha! Grah! Trap door! Bwah!" You're reduced to incoherency, trying to figure out how this girl can possibly have a trap door in her house. Before you can formulate anything cognizant she's pulling you to your feet.
"Come on, I have something for you." She says, still grinning.
You look at her skeptically, "What is it, Yuki?"
"A gift." This only heightens your suspicions.
"Yuki, the last 'gift' you gave me turned my hair green." You give her a scornful look.
"Oh, come on," she says, rolling her eyes, "You can't say it didn't give your hair fantastic body, though."
You look a little embarrassed, "Well..."
"I promise, no tricks this time, just this gift." A promise from Yuki is worth about as much as an Amish TV, but the way she looks at you... It's the most sincere look you've ever been given.
"Oh, all right, what is it?" You say, giving in.
131.title: Surprise!

choices: You were transformed into a Nekomata, a two-tailed Catgirl!
You were turned into a Catgirl!
Actually, you might've transformed into something completely different. Oops!
1311.content:
What Yukiro gave to you wasn't another one of her surprise prank gifts. Instead, it was some sort of lightweight cat figurine. "Aww, Yuki! It looks so cute! But, um...why does it have two tails, exactly?" You said, noticing that it wasn't no ordinary cat figurine, seeing two cat tails sticking out from the clay figurine.

"Oh, that's because it's no ordinary figurine, Cat. It's a Nekomata figurine, teehee!" Yukiro explained, showing off her cheerful demeanor to you once more. However, it felt as if you had a very bad feeling about all of this, as if it was another one of Yukiro's pranks. "Uh, Yuki? Why do I have a bad feeling that this is one of your pranks?" You nervous asked, just as you could've sworn you saw what appeared to be a cat tail sticking out from Yukiro's rear, all while she began to giggle some more and replied, "Oh no, this isn't a prank. In fact, I think of it as more of a SURPRISE, NYA!!"

Just as she said the word "surprise", Yukiro quickly tripped you at an inhuman speed, not even giving you anytime to react. In the process, you lost your grip on the Nekomata figurine she gave, as you landed hard on your back, where the figurine then shattered on top of you. From there, you were instantly covered in smoke with a loud "POOF!" noise to be heard within the chaos, covering you from head to toe. But suddenly, you felt something changing you on every part of your body, lasting for a few seconds before the cloud of smoke of dissipated, revealing that...
1311.title: A Lucky Cat Figurine

choices: You quickly left Yukiro's house. After all, this was HER fault in the 1st place.
You stayed & comforted Yukiro. After all, she felt very lonely as a Nekomata.
13111.content:
With the smoke finally cleared up, you quickly got up, only to have a weird feeling that something felt...wrong, with you, just as you grabbed the side of your head with one hand and said, "Uuuugghh, my head! What....what happened?" "HOORAY!! It worked, Nyah!" Yuki exclaimed, as you suddenly felt her pin you down, as if she saw something that made her super happy.

And yet, while she was pinning you down, you could've sworn you heard Yuki...purring like a cat. Quickly turning your body, you were currently laying on your back, revealing why you heard these purring sounds from Yuki; she was a freaking Catgirl! This caused you to literally freak out from panic, pushing her off of you while she kept holding on as you screamed, "AAAAH!!! Get off of me!! Get off of me!! GET THE FREAKING HELL OFF OF MEEEEE!!!!!"

But as you moved your hands on top of Yuki's head in an attempt to push her off of you, you got a clear view of what actually happened, as you saw that half of your arms were covered in lush light brown fur, and your hands had become these thick feline paw-like hands, with 3 thick paw-like fingers and a thick paw-like thumb on each hand, making you shake out of pure unadulterated fear, with that sense of fear increasing when you moved your new feline paw-like hands to the top of your head, only to feel a pair of large brown cat ears in place of your already gone human ears, causing your eyes to get a bit watery, right on the brink of letting out the waterworks.

And when you finally felt your two brown cat tails underneath you, that was the last straw for you, as you began to sob and cry like crazy, just as your cat ears drooped down to the sides. From hearing you cry, Yukiro stopped hugging you to take notice of your emotional breakdown from finding out that you're no longer fully human. So, in an attempt to calm you down, Yukiro had you lay in her lap down on the floor, as she spoke to you and asked, "I'm so so so sorry for making you cry, Cat, Nyah! I just wanted to....to make you happy, that's all, Nya."

"Hap-*hic*-Happy?! Does it l-look like I'm *whine* happy to you, Yuki?! Why would you do this to me?! I'm your friend!" You answered, clearly in a mix between sadness and anger, making Yukiro upset herself, as her large fiery-red cat ears drooped down to the sides of her head, showing how depressed she was getting, as she was beginning to shed a few tears herself. In turn, this made you feel guilty from yelling at her.

"You're....You're not actually human, are you?" You asked, wanting to get some answers without severely hurting Yuki's feelings anymore than you already have. In response, Yuki simply nodded once and replied, "No, Cathy. I...I wasn't born as a human being. The truth is, I'm....I-I'm a Nekomata, a Catgirl born with two tails that are filled with high levels of magical power. T-That figurine I g-gave you was enchanted with a spell to c-change you into a Nekomata like....like m-me. *sob*" Using one of her red furry paw-like hands, Yukiro wiped the tears with her feline-like limb, as she then continued speaking and said, "T-The reason why I-I changed you into a Nekomata is because....i-is b-because I...I, um....I......I'M ALL ALOOONNE!! NNNYYYAAAA-AAAHH-AAHH-AAAAAAHHH!! *loud repeating sobbing*"

Once you heard her crying, you thought that now would be a good time to leave while she was having a crying fit. However, it was there that you realized that what Yukiro had said to you wasn't some story she made up. Instead, she was showing real genuine emotions, and real genuine tears, which made you torn between either leaving her or staying here and comforting Yuki, the very prankster who turned into a Nekomata. But in the end though....
13111.title: Catherine The Nekomata

131112.content:
As you looked at your friend, you could see just how upset she was. These were her true feelings, being one of, if not the only, Nekomata in this world. You could only imagine how long she must have been feeling like this. Despite how upset you were with her, you knew she needed you now. With your big paws, you gently wrapped yourself around the Neko.

"Yuki, how long have you felt like this?" you asked, rubbing her back softly. Yukiro didn't say anything at first, her body falling into your own. As you continued rubbing her, you could somehow tell that she what you were doing was working, as if by instinct.

Finally, Yukiro pulled herself back and sat in Seiza. She looked up at you, tears still flowing quietly from her face, and responded, "For one or two hundred years. I know everyone cares for me but...it's just not the same, Ny. There's no one who understands what it's like to be like this." She let out a little sob before continuing. "That's why I turned you into a Neko just like me, because your one of my best friends, Nya. I thought...you might be able to understand, but...it was wrong of me to do this to you, Ny Ny. I can change you back. Let me just-"

You quickly cut her off. "Yuki, please just relax. I'm sorry for being so upset. If this really means so much to you, then I guess I can stay like this, at least for a while." Yuki's face lit up with pure joy. "REALLY!? REALLY?! NYAHHHHHHH!!!!!!" She screamed as she pounced on you. The both of you fell back as she hugged you furiously.

"Ok, Ok!!! I'm glad your happy again but please don't keep doing that. This body is a bit...sensitive" you said, rolling away from her. "I'll try, Nyah" she replied, grinning brightly.

With the tears washed way, you wonder what to do next?
131112.title: Comforting the poor kitty

131222.title: Your belly (Pregnancy or expansion)

choices: ...That I am received permission to secret tell."
14.content:
Over the phone comes the familiar, strange accent of Krell. Sometimes you wonder if she really is from Yugoslavia. You haven't been over to her house yet, Krell said her host family was currently getting some renovations done, and didn't want anyone to come over while the bulk of the construction was going on.

Listening over the receiver, Krell starts, "Hello greetings, I am speaking to the Catherine of Bryant, yes?"
You sigh a little, "Yeah Krell, it's me. And how many times have I said, you can call me Cathy, or Cat."
"I am apologize, but for matters of important, full positive identification name must be confirmed."
"Uh... OK, whatever. So what's up?"
"Currently above me is fixture light fluorescent, currently energize, followed by ceiling, followed by-" You interrupt her. She still hasn't gotten over this little quirk.
"No, I mean, what's going on, why are you calling, you said it was important?"
"Oh! Yesyes, am apologize, sometimes language slang evasive is still. Purpose of communication, yes, important, yes. I am needing you to travel to my domicile."
"Really? I thought the Smiths didn't want anyone coming over 'til the renovations were done?"
"I! Yesno, bulk of upgrades are having their completion in near past. Authorization for others to come have are granted."
"Ooooh... Kay." Sometimes you wonder if the girl will ever speak proper English, "So, why do you need me to come over."
"Precise purpose is not authorized for transmission without faceface talk, but general needing is...
14.title: Otherworldly Friend

141.content:
"You... Need help with... emotion?" You manage to stammer out.
"Situation explain is... difficult... But needing I am help knowing to react in situations appropriate." She explains unhelpfully.
You pinch the bridge of your nose in frustration. You like Krell, you really do. She's kind, and friendly, and eager to help. She's also really, really smart, at least when it comes to math and science. But sometimes you can't help but wonder if she was grown in a tube, or something. Sometimes it's like she just doesn't know how to behave around people. She's got no sense of tact, simple tasks sometimes elude her, and your other friends tell you that when she first showed up she was even worse. Sighing, you realize that, given the help she's given you with algebra, you figure you can at least go over and see what she wants. Plus maybe if you help her out with whatever she wants, maybe you can avoid another sausage incident. You liked that coffee shop too.

"Alright, Krell... I'll come on over and see what I can do."
"Mighty moons many thanks friend Cathy! Vision on you soonly."
"Yeah... I'll be over in a few minutes."

The drive over is uneventful, and you soon reach her house. She answers you at the door, and smiles, then, unsure of herself, extends her arms as if to hug you in greeting, but hesitates, with a slightly unsure look on her face. You decide to take the initiative and give her a small hug, which she returns, the relief on her face is palpable. "Sorry," She says, "I was not sure if contact physical situation appropriate being..."
"Yes, Krell, it's OK to give me a friendly hug as a way of saying 'hi.'" You say with a bit of a sigh, but smile at the same time. The poor girl is really trying to fit in, but it's like she's had almost no experience beforehand.
"Tasticfans. To sleeping quarters you come yes?"
"You mean your bedroom? Sure. By the way, are your host parents home?"
"Negative query. Out night for them are... yes?"
"Yeah, I understand."

She leads you through the house. It's clean, almost immaculately so. You can't help but notice that every room you pass looks like it should be a photograph in a furniture magazine. There's something vaguely unsettling about it. Finally you reach her room, which is the only one thus far that actually looks lived in, though it's spartan compared to the rest of the house. No posters adorn the walls, nor are they any old toys or keepsakes on the shelves. You chalk this up to Krell visiting from abroad.

"So, Krell... What did you need help with?"
"Needing to know how... Oh, is embarrass having..." She actually blushes. Normally she seems almost clinically detached. You fear that whatever it is must be very sensitive.
"It's OK, whatever it is you must be willing to tell me, otherwise you wouldn't have asked me over." You lay a reassuring hand on her shoulder.
"Needing help I be am going have yes no RRrrgh!" Her words seem to get away from her, and she grunts in frustration. Standing up she walks over to a dresser drawer and pulls out what look like two metal headbands. She hands one to you and puts one on, before taking a deep breath.
"Catfriend, trust having in I, yes? This are... experimental device. On put. May slight pain feel, but initial once am doneover..." She pauses again, she's talking slowly, trying to make sure her point comes across, "Once connection made, good talk will occur?"
"Your saying that these can make us talk... better?" You raise an eyebrow out of skepticism and confusion.
"Yesyesyesyes, now onput please." She says eagerly.
You sigh and shrug, slipping the metal band over your crown. She reaches over and taps a button on yours, then puts her finger on her band, "Now, might uncomfortable be moment."
The meaning gets across, as you wince in anticipation, but you trust she wouldn't hurt you. She taps hers, and for a moment, there's a blinding flash of pain, that sends you to the ground with a cry. It passes quickly, but you're left with a lingering ringing pain. It seems to be fading, as you hear Krell's voice, "Cathy! Cathy are you alright?"
"Owww... Krell? What the hell." You're more confused than angry. Not to say that you aren't angry. That hurt!
"I'm sorry, Cat!" Krell says, very apologetically, "I didn't anticipate the link would cause you that much discomfort." She cradles you, as you grasp your forehead. Fortunately the pain seems to be dissipating rather quickly, which is when something clicks.
"Krell... how come I can understand what you're saying now?"
"It's the rings... They're experimental, and I really shouldn't have used them but the task I asked you over to help me with may require clarity of communications. They work by forming an empathic link between two people's brains so that the intent of their words can immediately be understood. I'm actually speaking my native tongue right now. Your brain is just translating it into English thanks to the empathic link."
"And now it's gone again." Krell pouts, but your grin soon has her perk up again.
"Oh! It was a joke, playing on my tendency to use large or complex words to explain myself!"
You laugh, the pain almost gone, "Yes Krell, it was a joke. Boy these things are really amazing, minus the whole blinding pain bit."
"Yes, they are. Once again, I'm sorry they caused so much discomfort. You can actually take them off now. The link should last for about 12 standard hours."
"Standard hours? As opposed to regular hours?" You rib her.
She blushes a bit, kind of unsure on how to respond. She doesn't have to, as you ask, "So... As amazing as these are, you said you needed help with an... emotion?"
She blushes even harder now, "Yes..."
"I'm not sure I really understand the request..."
"I need you to..." She pauses a minute, and takes a breath, trying to figure out the right words to use and find the courage to say them, "I need you to show me love." She finally blurts out.

Taken aback by her odd request, you finally manage to say...
141.title: I got tired of writing the accent

choices: She's been studying in the right places
Book learnin' don't beat street smarts
Um... Where exactly has she been studying, again?
1411.content:
You stare, blank faced at Krell, did she really just say what you think she said, "I... I'm sorry, I think those things are broken." You say, indicating the rings, "I'm pretty sure that there's no way for you to have said what I think you just said."

She looks disheartened, blushing, "I'm... I'm sorry, it's just that... And I... You..." she begins to sniff, as you immediately feel bad.

You scoot up to her, putting a comforting arm around her, "H-hey," you say nervously, "Don't cry, I... you just caught me off guard, that's all."

She sniffles a little, and looks up at you, "D-does that mean you'll do it?" she asks, hopefully.

You swallow nervously, blushing, looking into her eyes, "I..." She was very pretty, and you were curious, but it was all so sudden, "Why me?" you finish.

"B-back home, it is tradition to share at least one moment of intimacy with your best friend, before the end of initial education..." She explained, "And since you're my best friend, and..." she trails off, pushing her fingers together,

"I... I've never done anything like this before," you say, nervously.
"Neither have I..." she responded.
"I... I guess we should..." Before you can finish your sentence, Krell pushes her lips to yours, as you mmph in surprise. However, instead of fighting it, you're soon blushing madly, pushing your lips to hers, hugging her tight, and exploring her mouth with your tongue. Hers seems to be almost impossibly long, and when you finally both break the kiss, you're both blushing madly, and panting, "Wow..." you gasp.

info.brief_description: A young woman discovers her friends have some disturbing secrets.
info.description:
Hello, welcome, hope you enjoy, and I hope that you add even more. But before you do, I'd like to you to follow a couple of guidelines.

Use proper spelling, grammar, and punctuation. When people are speaking, be sure to put what they're saying in quotes. Also be sure to break up your entries into paragraphs every so often. As a rule of thumb, try not to have a single paragraph longer than nine sentences.

Try to be as descriptive as possible. Avoid one-line chapters if you can.

Endings are allowed, but if you are making a chapter with an ending, one of the choices in the previous chapter must continue the story.

Stay consistent with previous chapters in the same story arc.

The first 4 characters introduced are Catherine's best friends. They'd never knowingly do anything to hurt Catherine, willingly. Now, it may be that their nature gets the better of them, or circumstances may cause them to do something they don't want to, but they'll never act maliciously towards Cat.

Though not outright stated, it should be obvious what each of the girls are. If you can't figure out what they're supposed to be, drop me a line and let me know.

Chapters are to be written in second or third person (ex. “you go down the stairs” or “alice goes down the stairs”.) No additions in first person (“I go down the stairs.”) And keep the tense consistent

There will be sex. There will probably be some kinky sex. There will probably be a great deal of fetishes covered, including bondage, transformation, furries, and vore. The only thing specifically disallowed is pedophilia.

Avoid choice chapters if at all possible (A chapter consisting solely of 2 options) If you do end up making one, please fill out at least one of the choices.

I reserve the right to remove or modify any chapters not following these guidelines. However, if I do deem it necessary to do so, you will get a notification beforehand and an opportunity to modify your chapter to bring it in line.

If you are unsure of anything, have any questions/comments/whatnots, please drop me a line on the onsite e-mail, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

If you want to reserve a chapter, drop me a line on my onsite e-mail. If you reserve a chapter, it will be held for you for two weeks.

Other than that, please add, and enjoy. There will be rewards for good additions.
info.pretty_title: The Secret Lives of Your Friends
